This is the list of journals listed as ABS4\*, ABS4, ABS3 or ABS2.

**Updated in: 04 November 2024**

## ABS4*

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning= FALSE}
library(readxl)
smart <- read_excel("abs44.xlsx")
knitr::kable(head(smart[, 1:3],1000))
```
